name: drawRects
description: FireSight op draws RotatedRect array from named stage model. Because some folks like square corners, while others are well-rounded.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: name of stage that generates rects model to be drawn

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: if radius>0, draw of a circle of the given radius instead of rectangle. Default is 0

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: JSON array corresponding to cv::Scalar with 1-4 elements ([-1 -1 -1 -1] default)
